thread.title: Little Italy and China town and more.
thread.title_full: Little Italy and China town and more. - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MACQUE2014
title: Little Italy and China town and more.
text: For a taste of little Italy and China Town the NobleDEN sits on the corner of both neighborhoods,the only hotel around it's like staying with a friend in New York City. Clean, friendly and with balconies with city views and reasonably priced.
